questionTitle: <u><font color='red'>There are</font></u> <u><font color='red'>a lot of</font></u> multi- storey buildings <u><font color='red'>on</font></u> the center <u><font color='red'>of</font></u> Tokyo.

They have ________ the old castle and it is now a luxury hotel.

________ we set off in the next few minutes, we'll be there in time.
